verses.name: Proverbs 17:17
verses.text: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:18
verses.text: A man void of understanding striketh hands, and becometh surety in the presence of his friend.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:19
verses.text: He loveth transgression that loveth strife: and he that exalteth his gate seeketh destruction.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:20
verses.text: He that hath a froward heart findeth no good: and he that hath a perverse tongue falleth into mischief.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:21
verses.text: He that begetteth a fool doeth it to his sorrow: and the father of a fool hath no joy.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:22
verses.text: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
